Created by Dedrick "Baedrick" Koh
Version 2.0.r1

To open colored header creator use:
Tools > Colored Header Creator

Contact: https://baedrick.carrd.co/

Suggestions to improve the code please reach out to me dedrickkoh1@gmail.com

Any issues please report in an email to dedrickkoh1@gmail.com
In the email please state what were the steps you took to encounter the error. Screenshots are encouraged.

Contribution credit:
- Glenneroo (general optimisation and bug fixes)
